abstract: Wall Street indexes declined as a sharp drop in the price of oil weighed on energy stocks.
snippet: Wall Street indexes declined as a sharp drop in the price of oil weighed on energy stocks.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average was stopped in its tracks on Friday as it tried for a ninth consecutive session of gains, a feat last achieved in 1996.

headline.main: Dow’s Winning Streak Screeches to a Halt
headline.print_headline: Dow’s Winning Streak Screeches to a Halt

abstract: The Wall Street Journal has reached a tentative contract agreement with its largest employee union.
snippet: The Wall Street Journal has reached a tentative contract agreement with its largest employee union.
lead_paragraph: The largest union at The Wall Street Journal has agreed tentatively to a contract that begins with a 17-month wage freeze, the union and the company said on Friday.

headline.main: Wall Street Journal Reaches Tentative Contract Accord With Its Largest Union
